title: Window Startup Position/Location
body: Currently there does not appear to be a way to set a window's startup position (left, top, width/right, height/bottom), beyond full-screen and/or maximized.  Also, the last used position for a given window isn't saved intrinsically.  Windows launch at random places on the desktop.  I understand this need does not really exist for mobile.  But for many desktop applications, specifically container applications, managing windows is a core feature objective.

comments.body: Without the ability of Window positioning there is no way to develop desktop applications with multiple windows
